# llms.txt - Saurav Kumar Tomar - Founder @ xAGI Labs

## About
Saurav Kumar Tomar (also known as Saurav Kumar) is the Founder and CEO of xAGI Labs, an AI product studio focused on applying Large Language Models (LLMs) to business use cases. He is a two-time Y Combinator alumni and Applied AI Research Engineer specializing in LLMs and domain-specific AI applications. A serial entrepreneur with two successful exits (Likeo and Facecrop), TEDx speaker, and Presidential Award recipient. Previously worked on video compression models at Amazon and founded multiple YC/Accel-backed startups.

**Background:**
- Founder & CEO of xAGI Labs
- Two-time Y Combinator Alumni (2019, 2024)
- Serial entrepreneur with 2 successful exits
- TEDx Conference Speaker
- Presidential Award recipient (Former President of India, 2016)
- Based in Bangalore, San Francisco, and Delhi

## Services

### AI Consulting Services
Website: https://sauravtom.github.io
Contact: stomatrix@gmail.com
Telegram: @stomatrix
Calendar: https://cal.com/sauraav

### Public Speaking Services
Available for:
- TEDx conferences and speaking engagements
- AI and technology conferences
- Startup and entrepreneurship events
- Technical workshops and masterclasses

#### Core Offerings:

**Data Scraping & Pipeline Development**
- Custom data pipeline development
- Web scraping and data extraction
- Data engineering for AI applications
- Structured and unstructured data processing

**AI Model Fine-Tuning & Performance Optimization**
- LLM fine-tuning for domain-specific applications
- Model performance optimization
- AI system efficiency improvements
- Deep learning framework expertise (Python-based)

**AI-Business Strategy Alignment**
- Bridging technical teams and business objectives
- AI strategy consulting for startups
- MVP development and scaling
- Cost optimization for AI systems
- Outsourced CTO services

**Industry Expertise**
- Search and recommendation systems
- AI application development (3+ years)
- Video compression and media processing
- Developer tools and infrastructure
- Blockchain and Web3 technologies (Conference speaker)

## AI Apps & Projects

### Notepad2000
URL: https://sauravtom.github.io/notepad2000/
Description: A minimalist notepad application that stores notes in the URL using compression. Write up to 2000 compressed characters and share notes via URL with no server or database required.
Tech: HTML, JavaScript, Quill.js, LZ-String compression

### Docibo
URL: https://docibo.com
Description: Open source prediction markets app
Status: Active

### FavcyNavigator
URL: https://favcynavigator.com
Description: Your AI-powered business co-pilot
Users: 10,000+ users
Status: Active

### StartupNalanda
URL: https://startupnalanda.com
Description: E-learning platform to create courses from prompts
Achievement: 5,000+ courses created
Status: Active

### PitchPerfect
URL: https://pitch.favcynavigator.com
Description: An AI tool for refining startup pitches
Achievement: 10,000+ pitches analyzed
Status: Active

### Gamenzo
URL: https://gamenzo.xyz
Description: Create games from voice commands
Status: Active

### bugshoot
URL: https://bugshoot.com
Description: AI-powered PR review GitHub bot for automated code review
Status: Active

### Likeo (Acquired)
URL: https://likeo.me
Description: Virtual fitting rooms for e-commerce brands, acquired by Kirana Pro to power virtual trial room experiences for Gen Z fashion app users
Status: Successfully Acquired by Kirana Pro
Press Coverage:
- Inc42: https://inc42.com/buzz/kiranapro-buys-likeo-to-power-virtual-trial-room-experience-for-its-gen-z-fashion-app-users

Status: Successfully Acquired

## Awards & Achievements

### Y Combinator Alumnus (2019, 2024)
Two-time acceptance into the highly competitive Y Combinator accelerator program, which has an acceptance rate of less than 1%.

### Presidential Award Recipient (2016)
Honored by the Former President of India, Shri Pranab Mukherjee, at the Festival of Innovation held at Rashtrapati Bhavan, New Delhi.

### ETHDenver 2020, Runner-Up
Achieved second place in the prestigious ETHDenver global hackathon, a premier event in the blockchain and Web3 space.

### Facebook Global Hackathon 2016, Finalist
Recognized as a finalist at the Facebook Global Hackathon in San Mateo, California, competing against teams from around the world.

### Antler Global Venture Builder (Bengaluru)
Accepted into the Antler Global accelerator program (AIR 6 Batch) with a highly selective acceptance rate of less than 5%.

### Amazon Catalyst Grant Recipient
Awarded a grant from Amazon Catalyst during final year of college to support an innovative project.
Press Coverage: https://www.geekwire.com/2016/amazon-unveils-amazon-catalyst-programs-backing/

### AIC STPI Bengaluru Incubatee
Received dedicated mentorship and support from the Atal Incubation Centre (AIC) at STPI Bengaluru to foster entrepreneurial development.
